TEXT: A chef looking for the best food and ingredients. NL Master of frozen cards and mystical recipes.
NL You prepare your sharpest knives.

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~strange~ ~person,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
